comments.body:
`s/p/position/`  (please use complete words in variable names)

Also, `jumpTo` generates scroll notifications synchronously, which could run arbitrary code that mutates `_positions` during this loop.  To avoid any shenanigans, I'd recommend using `new List<ScrollPosition>.from(_positions)` to make a copy of the list for the iteration.
Ooh - devious! Thanks for spotting this. Done.
